title: Putin appoints Ukraine veteran governor as military gains prestige
content: The “Time of Heroes” program to promote veterans from the Ukraine war is part of the Kremlin’s after to make military service more attractive.
summary: The “Time of Heroes” program to promote veterans from the Ukraine war is part of the Kremlin’s after to make military service more attractive.

title: The world is trying to make sense of the U.S. electoral college
content: The United States has a distinctive system for electing presidents indirectly — a source of confusion for those following the Trump-Harris race internationally.
summary: The United States has a distinctive system for electing presidents indirectly — a source of confusion for those following the Trump-Harris race internationally.

title: Israelis and Palestinians find little hope in divisive U.S. election
Live briefing: Blinken urges Israel to increase Gaza aid as U.S. deadline looms
content: The Biden administration warned Oct. 13 that Israel had 30 days to ensure more humanitarian aid to Gaza or the U.S. would consider restricting weapons transfers.
summary: The Biden administration warned Oct. 13 that Israel had 30 days to ensure more humanitarian aid to Gaza or the U.S. would consider restricting weapons transfers.

title: Brazilian police say they’ve solved the murder of former Post contributor
content: Authorities have concluded that the killings of British journalist Dom Phillips and Indigenous rights activist Bruno Pereira were an act of retaliation targeting Pereira.
summary: Authorities have concluded that the killings of British journalist Dom Phillips and Indigenous rights activist Bruno Pereira were an act of retaliation targeting Pereira.

title: Israeli strikes in eastern Lebanon are hitting civilians without warning
Israel’s actions on Gaza aid ‘not good enough,’ State Department says
Israeli forces used civilians as human shields in Gaza, Palestinians and soldiers say
Diver finds and returns graduation ring lost for decades in the ocean
content: Alex Davis used a metal detector to find a lost graduation ring buried in Barbados. He returned it to its owner in Canada just before the man’s 83rd birthday.
summary: Alex Davis used a metal detector to find a lost graduation ring buried in Barbados. He returned it to its owner in Canada just before the man’s 83rd birthday.

title: Player dies after being struck by lightning during soccer match in Peru
content: Teams in a local tournament in the Andean highlands east of Lima were leaving the pitch amid a weather delay when lightning struck, injuring several other players.
summary: Teams in a local tournament in the Andean highlands east of Lima were leaving the pitch amid a weather delay when lightning struck, injuring several other players.

title: Israel ends agreement with U.N. agency for Palestinians
content: Israel said it has withdrawn from the 1967 deal legally recognizing UNRWA. The Knesset has passed legislation curbing the U.N. agency’s activities and privileges.
summary: Israel said it has withdrawn from the 1967 deal legally recognizing UNRWA. The Knesset has passed legislation curbing the U.N. agency’s activities and privileges.

title: Russia suspected in plot to target cargo planes in Europe and the U.S.
content: Officials say proxies working for Russia were likely behind bombs destined for DHL flights in Europe, and U.S.-bound planes may have been a future target.
summary: Officials say proxies working for Russia were likely behind bombs destined for DHL flights in Europe, and U.S.-bound planes may have been a future target.

title: Israel still restricting aid one week ahead of U.S. deadline
Israel investigates alleged document leak to foreign media
As regional violence rages, Saudi Arabia pitches itself as investment hub
Israeli strikes in eastern Lebanon are hitting civilians without warning
content: At least 10 of 14 strikes Friday that caused casualties in the northern Bekaa Valley were outside the Israeli military’s evacuation zone, a Post review found.
summary: At least 10 of 14 strikes Friday that caused casualties in the northern Bekaa Valley were outside the Israeli military’s evacuation zone, a Post review found.

title: Why the U.S. election is so long and others around the world are so short
content: The end of a U.S. election season can feel like the final leg of a marathon. That’s because the U.S. stands out among global democracies for its long campaigns.
summary: The end of a U.S. election season can feel like the final leg of a marathon. That’s because the U.S. stands out among global democracies for its long campaigns.

title: Protesters hurl mud at Spain’s king, queen and prime minister after floods
content: King Felipe, Queen Letizia and Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez were met with anger in Paiporta, a town badly hit by the devastating floods in Valencia.
summary: King Felipe, Queen Letizia and Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez were met with anger in Paiporta, a town badly hit by the devastating floods in Valencia.

title: Pro-E.U. candidate wins Moldova runoff despite fears of Russian interference
content: Maia Sandu led with 55.41 percent against Alexandr Stoianoglo, a former prosecutor general backed by the pro-Russian Party of Socialists.
summary: Maia Sandu led with 55.41 percent against Alexandr Stoianoglo, a former prosecutor general backed by the pro-Russian Party of Socialists.

title: Israel withdraws from 1967 deal that recognizes UNRWA; agency says it is in the dark
Meet the Russian blogger accused of U.S. election interference
content: Blogs and programs like Mikhail Zvinchuk’s Rybar represent a transformation of Russia’s information sphere amid dissatisfaction with empty state media reports.
summary: Blogs and programs like Mikhail Zvinchuk’s Rybar represent a transformation of Russia’s information sphere amid dissatisfaction with empty state media reports.

title: Israeli forces used civilians as human shields in Gaza, Palestinians and soldiers say
Where Trump and Harris stand on global issues ahead of the U.S. election
content: The new president will face a host of foreign policy challenges including immigration, climate change and wars in Ukraine and the Middle East.
summary: The new president will face a host of foreign policy challenges including immigration, climate change and wars in Ukraine and the Middle East.

title: As U.S. election nears, ‘fascism’ is in the spotlight again
content: Though former members of Trump’s administration have called him a fascist, his political prospects have not dimmed. What does that tell us about the term’s power and usefulness?
summary: Though former members of Trump’s administration have called him a fascist, his political prospects have not dimmed. What does that tell us about the term’s power and usefulness?

title: As regional violence rages, Saudi Arabia pitches itself as investment hub
content: The summit in Riyadh, known as the Future Investment Initiative, allowed the kingdom to showcase its ambitious plans to reshape its economy.
summary: The summit in Riyadh, known as the Future Investment Initiative, allowed the kingdom to showcase its ambitious plans to reshape its economy.
